tool_description: Records detailed metadata for geological samples collected during field surveys including location, depth, and collection parameters.

latitude.description: Collection site latitude in decimal degrees

longitude.description: Collection site longitude in decimal degrees

sample_type.description: Type of sample: rock, soil, sediment, water, core

collection_method.description: Method used: drilling, excavation, surface, grab, composite

collector_name.description: Name of person collecting the sample

error_messages: Invalid sample ID: Sample ID must be unique and non-empty.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid depth: Depth must be non-negative number.
Invalid sample type: Use one of [rock, soil, sediment, water, core].
Invalid collection method: Use one of [drilling, excavation, surface, grab, composite].
Missing collector information: Collector name is required for chain of custody.
usage: Provide sample identification, location, collection details, and collector information to create comprehensive sample record.
